channel.title: Help with spawning
channel.description: ok, i want to spawn 1m of each rune at a time, but im not sure how to go about this.. i know how to spawn 1, lol.. and now its 10 but how do you get 1m of each?

item.title: Help with spawning
item.dc:creator: @OyVeyIzMir OyVeyIzMir
item.description:
@OyVeyIzMir wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:5, topic:8796”][quote author=OyVeyIzMir link=topic=12499.msg2518173#msg2518173 date=1225748391]

there’s a cilent code for that ::runes
Search on moparscape for it… it gives you 1000k of each though

Yah but not all clients automatically have that. [br][br]
[/quote]
Moparscape the client does not have a ‘::runes’ command.

Commands are done server side. Unless you have things such as ::fpson or ::fpsoff or ::noclip

Commands for items, spawning, and teleporting are all done server side.[/quote]

Haha, good you fixed the quote =p But yeah your right. That’s what I was trying to get at. But I think he gets it. Anyways hes offline so theres no point in further posting =/

Read full topic

item.title: Help with spawning
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“OyVeyIzMir, post:4, topic:8796”][quote author=darkrounge link=topic=12499.msg2518159#msg2518159 date=1225747603]
there’s a cilent code for that ::runes
Search on moparscape for it… it gives you 1000k of each though
[/quote]

Yah but not all clients automatically have that. [br][br][/quote]
Moparscape the client does not have a ‘::runes’ command.

Commands are done server side. Unless you have things such as ::fpson or ::fpsoff or ::noclip

Commands for items, spawning, and teleporting are all done server side.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with spawning
item.dc:creator: @OyVeyIzMir OyVeyIzMir
item.description:
@OyVeyIzMir wrote:

[quote=“darkrounge, post:2, topic:8796”]there’s a cilent code for that ::runes
Search on moparscape for it… it gives you 1000k of each though[/quote]

Yah but not all clients automatically have that. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2008, 03:42:23 pm[/size][hr][quote=“curry muncha, post:3, topic:8796”]well, just add this to your client.java

if (command.startsWith("runes") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(556, 1000000); addItem(555, 1000000); addItem(557, 1000000); addItem(554, 1000000); addItem(558, 1000000); addItem(566, 1000000); addItem(560, 1000000); addItem(565, 1000000); addItem(562, 1000000); addItem(563, 1000000); addItem(563, 1000000); addItem(564, 1000000); addItem(4278, 1000000); }

add that with your other commands, and it will give you 1m, of each rune when you type, ::runes

enjoy[/quote]

But you’d probally want:

 if (command.startsWith("runes") && playerRights >= 2)

So not every1 can do it. Unless he wants that =p

Read full topic

item.title: Help with spawning
item.dc:creator: @curry_muncha curry muncha
item.description:
@curry_muncha wrote:

well, just add this to your client.java

if (command.startsWith("runes") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(556, 1000000); addItem(555, 1000000); addItem(557, 1000000); addItem(554, 1000000); addItem(558, 1000000); addItem(566, 1000000); addItem(560, 1000000); addItem(565, 1000000); addItem(562, 1000000); addItem(563, 1000000); addItem(563, 1000000); addItem(564, 1000000); addItem(4278, 1000000); }

add that with your other commands, and it will give you 1m, of each rune when you type, ::runes

enjoy

Read full topic
